summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CodeScope application including backend APIs, frontend functionality, and Chrome extension file verification
passed_tests: Backend /api/analyze endpoint correctly analyzes JavaScript code
Backend /api/analyze endpoint correctly analyzes Python code
Backend error handling properly rejects invalid requests
Frontend landing page loads with hero section, features grid, metrics breakdown, install steps, footer
Frontend navigation elements (Home, Analyzer, Features, Install) are present
Frontend Try Live Demo button is visible and functional
Frontend code preview shows syntax highlighting and complexity badges
Frontend displays floating metrics (MI Score, Complexity, Issues)
Chrome extension manifest.json exists with proper structure
Chrome extension content scripts (analyzer-core.js, content.js, content.css) exist
Chrome extension popup files (popup.html, popup.js, popup.css) exist
Chrome extension background service worker (background.js) exists
Chrome extension has proper permissions for GitHub integration
